name: Cassin
acquisitionMethod: Honor medal exchange, Explore Stage1-3, Light ship Construction

1.name: Baptismal Flames
1.description: When this ship's HP falls below 20.0%: restores $1 of its max HP. This skill can only activate once per battle.

2.name: Quick Reload
2.description: $1 chance to activate every 20s: increases this ship's RLD by $2 for 10s.

3.name: All Out Assault Ⅰ
3.description: Activate All Out Assault Ⅰ: Mahan Class once every 15 times the main gun is fired.

1.name: Cassin
1.description: Mahan-class destroyer - Cassin, Hull Number DD-372!

2.name: Cassin (Retrofit)
2.description: Commander... I think I've been in the house too long. My body feels different... Oh? I've improved? I see... Wonderful! I guess I can keep staying inside...

limitBreak.tier1: Unlock All Out Assault Ⅰ/All weapons' efficiency +2%
limitBreak.tier3: Improve All Out Assault/All weapons' efficiency +5%

1.chinese: 马汉级驱逐舰—卡辛，舷号DD-372
1.japanese: マハン級駆逐艦・カッシン（DD-372)
1.english: Mahan-class destroyer - Cassin, Hull Number DD-372!

2.chinese: 马汉级驱逐舰——卡辛，一直被吐槽重心不稳防空不强……至于在所罗门海带错路什么的，和我的左眼一点关系也没有
2.japanese: マハン級駆逐艦ーーカッシンよ。いつもトップヘビーだの、防御力が低いだの言われてるけど……ソロモン海の道案内間違えたのは、左目とあんまり関係ないけどね
2.english: Mahan-class destroyer, Cassin. I get picked on for being top heavy and not being great at defending the skies... My left eye has nothing to do with the Solomon Islands, alright? Just leave it.

3.chinese: 你好，我是卡辛……如果没什么大事的话，请让我好好宅在船坞里吧……
3.japanese: はじめまして、カッシンよ……特に用がないなら、ドックに引きこもらせてほしいんだけど……
3.english: How do you do? I'm Cassin... If you have no business with me, I'd like to stay in the docks...

4.chinese: 就算是指挥官也别想让我离开房间……
4.japanese: たとえ指揮官でも、私を部屋から連れ出せない
4.english: Even you can't make me leave my room, Commander...

5.chinese: 我没什么可让你好奇的地方……
5.japanese: 別に気になるところなんてないよ……
5.english: I don't have anything you'd be interested in...

6.chinese: 我说你，不说点什么吗？我不太会发起话题……
6.japanese: なにか言うことない？わたし、自分から言い出すのはちょっと苦手……
6.english: Don't you have anything to say? I'm not great at starting conversations...

7.chinese: 啊，你问我的眼睛？有一只假的……猜猜是哪只？
7.japanese: 目の話？実は片目が義眼なんだ……どっちなのか、当ててみて？
7.english: Oh, you want to know about my eyes? One of them is fake... Can you guess which?

8.chinese: 哦，大家都回来了，真好啊……
8.japanese: あ、みんな帰ってきた。よかった……（棒）

9.japanese: うん…別に…嫌いじゃない
9.english: Mmm... I don't hate this feeling...

10.japanese: グーダラ娘に、興味ある……？
10.english: Are you interested in shut-in girls?

11.chinese: 恩……有任务没完成也无所谓么？
11.japanese: うん……完了していない任務もあるけど、いいの？
11.english: Hm... We have some uncompleted missions, is that really fine?

12.chinese: 奖励来了……看来是有好好努力……
12.japanese: ボーナスが来たわ……頑張ったようね……
12.english: Rewards have arrived... Looks like we did well...

13.japanese: 新しいメール……見てみない？
13.english: New mail... Aren't you going to take a look?

14.chinese: 妹妹说我再这样下去会宅死在家里……又不是没宅死过，大惊小怪……
14.japanese: 妹から引きこもってばかりじゃ死んじゃうぞって言われた…いつものことなのに、別に…
14.english: My sister said I'd die from boredom if I always stay in my room... But we all die eventually anyway, so what's the big deal?

16.chinese: 就算变强了……还是想宅家……
16.japanese: 強くなっても……部屋に引きこもりたい……
16.english: Even if I get stronger... I'd rather stay in my room...

17.chinese: 嗯……对妨碍卡辛休假的家伙……有必要教育一下了
17.japanese: うん……カッシンの休みを邪魔したやつは…教育しないと。
17.english: Well... you're keeping me from my time off... I need to teach you some manners!

19.chinese: 好麻烦，果然还是回去吧
19.japanese: 面倒くさい…やっぱり帰ろうよ…
19.english: What a pain... Might as well head back.

21.chinese: 能让我安静地睡一会儿吗？
21.japanese: ちょっと静かに寝させてくれない？
21.english: Can't you just let me sleep for a while?

22.chinese: 指挥官，有什么事吗？只是和我聊天的话不是那么有意思的事哦……
22.japanese: 指揮官、何？わたしとおしゃべりしても別に面白くないと思うけど……
22.english: What is it, Commander? If you wanna have a chat with me then I doubt you'll have anything interesting to say...

23.chinese: 唔，怎么说呢……有空的话，一起午睡？
23.japanese: うん、なんて言ったらいいだろ……暇なら一緒に昼寝でもする？
23.english: Hmm, how should I say this... If you're free, would you like to take a nap together?

24.chinese: 指挥官，你最近睡相不太好哦，每次都睡到我这边来……欸，是我吗？
24.japanese: 指揮官、最近寝相が悪い。いつもわたしのほうに寄ってきて……え？わたしのほうからなのか？
24.english: Commander, you don't seem like you've been sleeping well recently... Huh? It's because I keep moving over to your side of the bed?

25.chinese: 指挥官真是绅士呢……不过这样反而让人有点生气，卡辛……真的这么没有魅力吗？
25.japanese: 指揮官って紳士的ね……逆に少しかっとなる。カッシン……そんなに魅力ないの？
25.english: You're a real gentleman, Commander... but it's actually making me a little angry. Am I really... that unattractive to you?

26.chinese: 原来指挥官一直偷偷在准备这个啊，我不在乎形式的……不过还是谢谢，我很开心
26.japanese: 指揮官、こういうのをずっと準備してくれてたんだ。わたし、形はなんでもいいよ……でもありがとう、嬉しい
26.english: Commander, you've been preparing this in secret this whole time? I'd have been fine with any kind of gift, but... thank you. I'm as happy as I can be.

1.chinese: 指挥官…我好像宅太久了，身体都感觉不一样了——诶？这是改造吗？呼…太好了，那我可以安心继续宅了…
1.japanese: 指揮官…私なんか引きこもってばっかで、体中がちょっとヘン――え？それは改造したから？ふぅ…よかった…これでまた安心して引きこもれるよね…
1.english: Commander... I've been cocoooned up in my room for so long that I've started to metamorphize... Eh? It's because of the retrofit? Phew... thank goodness. Well then, guess it's time to go back to my room.

2.chinese: 指挥官…我好像宅太久了，身体都感觉不一样了——诶？这是改造吗？呼…太好了，那我可以安心继续宅了…
2.japanese: 指揮官…私なんか引きこもってばっかで、体中がちょっとヘン――え？それは改造したから？ふぅ…よかった…これでまた安心して引きこもれるよね…
2.english: Commander... I've been cocoooned up in my room for so long that I've started to metamorphize... Eh? It's because of the retrofit? Phew... thank goodness. Well then, guess it's time to go back to my room.

3.chinese: 呼啊……指挥官，我要睡个回笼觉，你随意…
3.japanese: ふあ……二度寝するから、あとはよろしく…
3.english: Fwaah... Commander, I need to take another nap, so I'm leaving the rest to you...

4.chinese: 嗯…像这样不说话静静待在一起…好像也不错——
4.japanese: うん…静かに寄り添い合って…いい感じかも――
4.english: Mmh... just staying together quietly like this... might be pretty nice too.

5.chinese: 好好穿衣服？欸——才不要…比起这个，要喝碳酸饮料吗，指挥官？
5.japanese: 服はしっかり着て？えええ――いやよ…それより酸素コーラでもどぉ？指揮官？
5.english: Wear my clothes properly? Eh...? Don't wanna~ More importantly, care for an Oxy Cola, Commander?
